channel.title: Il rep++ for this plz help me simple question
channel.description: okay so i portforwarded and everything and i checked if my ports are opened then i created a jar file and put the cache and everything in so the server loads then i zipped it and sent to my freind after i checked on a site called canuseeme.org (open port checker) and it says success ur ports are opened but he cannot conenct to me i ran server and everything can someone plz help me?

item.title: Il rep++ for this plz help me simple question
item.dc:creator: @brandonscarinfo brandonscarinfo
item.description:
@brandonscarinfo wrote:

  1. you can’t rep++ so dont offer it.
  2. does he have the same JDK as your client?
    3)is his ip banned on your ipban list?
    4)try re-portforwarding
    5)if you can afford it, get a vps…thats what I did

Read full topic
